description: Complete system overview documenting the multi-agent orchestration architecture, core components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of the agent orchestration system, including agent specialization, initialization patterns, and inter-agent communication
Comprehensive documentation of the vector-based memory system, including embedding schemas, conversation storage patterns, and semantic search implementation
Documentation of data flow between components, focusing on agent handoffs, memory operations, and tool interactions
Detailed documentation of the Model Context Protocol implementation, including prompt templates and AI model interaction patterns
